00008 import pyMicropolis.micropolisEngine
00009 from pyMicropolis.micropolisEngine import micropolisengine, micropolisgtkengine, micropoliswindow, micropolisrobot
00010 import gtk
00011 import random
00012 import math
00013 
00014 
00015 def run():
00016 
00017     engine = micropolisgtkengine.CreateGTKEngine()
00018 
00019     engine.cityTax = 10
00020     engine.setPasses(200)
00021     setTile = engine.setTile
00022 
00023     if True:
00024         for i in range(0, 4):
00025             engine.addRobot(
00026                 micropolisrobot.MicropolisRobot_PacBot(
00027                     x=(8 * 16) + 3 + (16 * 2 * i),
00028                     y=(7 * 16) + 3,
00029                     direction=0))
00030 
00031     if False:
00032         for i in range(0, 20):
00033             engine.addRobot(
00034                 micropolisrobot.MicropolisRobot_PacBot(
00035                     x=random.randint(0, (micropolisengine.WORLD_W * 16) - 1),
00036                     y=random.randint(0, (micropolisengine.WORLD_H * 16) - 1),
00037                     direction = random.randint(0, 3) * math.pi / 2))
00038 
00039     if False:
00040         for y in range(0, micropolisengine.WORLD_H):
00041             for x in range(0, micropolisengine.WORLD_W):
00042                 setTile(x, y, micropolisengine.RUBBLE | micropolisengine.BLBNBIT)
00043 
00044         for y in range(10, 15):
00045             for x in range(10, 15):
00046                 setTile(x, y, micropolisengine.FIRE | micropolisengine.ANIMBIT)
00047 
00048     x = 0
00049     y = 0
00050 
00051     w = 800
00052     h = 600
00053 
00054     if True:
00055         win1 = micropoliswindow.MicropolisPanedWindow(engine=engine)
00056         #win1.set_default_size(w, h)
00057         win1.set_size_request(w, h)
00058         win1.move(x, y)
00059         win1.show_all()
00060 
00061     gtk.main()
